transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hashVal as string,
	TargetID as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
DataVaultSource derive(HKey = toString(sha2(256, byName($hashVal)))) ~> hashKeys
MapDrifted1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> NewRows
hashKeys, TargetKey exists(HKey == hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistRows
HUBSource derive(hashID = toString(byName($TargetID))) ~> TargetKey
NewRows select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name == 'HKey')),
		each(match(name == 'ID'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RowsToInsert
ExistRows derive(SystemInformationID = toBoolean(byName('SystemInformationID')),
		{Database Version} = toString(byName('Database Version')),
		VersionDate = toString(byName('VersionDate')),
		ModifiedDate = toString(byName('ModifiedDate'))) ~> MapDrifted1
RowsToInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HubLoad
